Verses: 1 en Magane, Nee En Vaarththaigalaik Kaaththu, En Kattalaigalai Unnidaththil Baththirappaduththu.
2 en Kattalaigalaiyum En Podhagaththaiyum Un Kanmaniyaippol Kaaththukkol, Appozhudhu Pizhaippaai.
3 avaigalai Un Viralgalil Katti, Avaigalai Un Irudhaya Palagaiyil Ezhudhikkol.
4 ichchaga Vaarththaigalaip Pesum Anniya Pennaagiya Parasthreekku Unnai Vilakkik Kaappadharkaaga,
5 gnaanaththai Nokki, Nee En Sagodhari Endrum, Buththiyaippaarththu, Nee En Inaththaal Endrum Solvaayaaga.
6 naan En Veettin Jannalaruge Nindru, Palagani Vazhiyaaip Paarththapodhu,
7 pedhaiyargalaagiya Vaalibarukkulle Oru Buththiyeena Vaalibanaik Kandu Avanai Gavaniththen.
8 avan Maalaimayangum Asthamananeraththilum, Iravin Irunda Andhagaaraththilum,
9 aval Irukkum Sandhukkaduththa Theruvil Sendru, Aval Veettuvazhiyaai Nadandhuponaan.
10 appozhudhu Idho, Vesiyin Aadaiyaabaranan Thariththa Thandhiramanamulla Oru Sthree Avanukku Edhirppattaal.
11 aval Vaayaadiyum Adangaadhavalumaanaval; Aval Kaalgal Veettile Tharikkiradhillai.
12 silavelai Veliyiliruppaal, Silavelai Veedhiyiliruppaal; Sandhugal Dhorum Padhiviruppaal.
13 aval Avanaip Pidiththu Muththancheydhu, Mugam Naanaamal Avanaip Paarththu:
14 samaadhaana Baligal Enmel Sumandhirundhadhu, Indraikkuththaan En Poruththanaigalai Niraivetrinen.
15 aadhalaal, Naan Unnai Sandhikkappurappattu, Un Mugaththai Aavalodu Thedinen; Ippozhudhu Unnaik Kandupidiththen.
16 en Manjaththai Raththina Kambalangalaalum, Egipthudhesaththu Visiththiramaana Melliya Vasthirangalaalum Singaariththen.
17 en Padukkaiyai Vellaippolaththaalum Sandhanaththaalum Lavangappattaiyaalum Vaasanai Kattinen.
18 vaa, Vidiyarkaalam Varaikkum Sambogamaayiruppom, Inbangalinaal Poorippom.
19 purushan Veettile Illai, Dhoorap Prayaanam Ponaan.
20 panappaiyaith Than Kaiyile Konduponaan, Kurikkappattanaalile Veettukku Varuvaan Endru Solli,
21 than Migudhiyaana Iniya Sorkalaal Avanai Vasappaduththi, Than Udhadugalin Madhuravaakkinaal Avanai Inangappanninaal.
22 udane Avan Aval Pinne Sendraan; Oru Maadu Adikkappadumpadi Selvadhupolum, Oru Moodan Vilangidappattu Dhandanaikkup Povadhupolum,
23 oru Kuruvi Than Praananai Vaangum Kanniyai Ariyaamal Adhil Vizhath Theevirikkiradhupolum, Avalukkup Pinne Ponaan; Ambu Avan Eeralaip Pilandhadhu.
24 aadhalaal Pillaigale, Enakku Sevikodungal; En Vaayin Vaarththaigalai Gavaniyungal.
25 un Irudhayam Aval Vazhiyile Saayavendaam; Aval Paadhaiyile Mayangith Thiriyaadhe.
26 aval Anegaraik Kaayappaduththi, Vizhappanninaal; Balavaangal Anegaraik Kolaiseydhaal.
27 aval Veedu Paadhaalaththukkuppom Vazhi; Adhu Marana Araigalukkuk Kondupoividum.
